Rakuten TV | QA, Video Encoding Engineer, Systems, Playback, Frontend, Backend | Barcelona, Spain | Full-time | Visa | Onsite

Rakuten TV is a video-on-demand (VOD) streaming service within the Rakuten's services group family, offering thousands of hours of high quality movies and TV series for subscription, rental and purchase.

Our stack is based in Rails, Nodejs, React, AWS, Docker, MySQL, Redis, ElasticSearch.

We are looking for several positions:

- QA: https://talent.rakuten.careers/jobs/rakuten-tv-europe-qa-eng....

- Systems: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/856069598/

- Video Encoding: https://talent.rakuten.careers/jobs/rakuten-tv-europe-video-....

- Frontend: https://talent.rakuten.careers/jobs/senior-javascript-develo....

- Backend: https://talent.rakuten.careers/jobs/ruby-software-developer-....

If interested, please write me: miquel dot barba at rakuten dot com or apply in https://jobs.rakuten.tv
